name: Paratus Health
long_description: Paratus Health is an AI voice intake nurse that automates pre-appointment patient interviews, saving doctors time and improving accuracy. By conducting dynamic symptom assessments before the visit, it delivers a structured summary, helping doctors walk in prepared, reducing missed diagnoses, and increasing clinic efficiency. Designed to replace inefficient forms and costly intake nurses, Paratus Health turns wasted waiting time into better care and higher ROI for providers.
